price: 15. Wuxuuna (Alle) ku dhidbay si sugan buuro waaweyn dhulka, si uusan idiinla iilan (wuxuuna yeelay) webiyaal iyo waddooyin si aad toos ugu socotaan.
arabic: وَأَلۡقَىٰ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ رَوَٰسِيَ أَن تَمِيدَ بِكُمۡ وَأَنۡهَٰرٗا وَسُبُلٗا لَّعَلَّكُمۡ تَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-alqā fī al-arḍi rawāsiya an tamīda bikum wa-anhāran wasubulan laʿallakum tahtadūna
